attributes.action: stop MP's being reelected if  ignoring their constituents wishes on brexit
attributes.background: In preparing to leave the European Union, various MP's have put their own interests before the will of their constituents.  They should be brought to account and refused permission to stand in the next election on the grounds of neglect, in that they did not represent the will of their electorate.

rejection.details: The selection of political candidates is a decision for political parties and not the UK Government or Parliament.
